data.enText: an area of a city that is very poor and where the houses are dirty and in bad condition

data.chText: 她是在利兹的贫民区长大的。
data.enText: She was brought up in the slums of Leeds.

data.chText: （短期）去贫穷地方，过简朴生活
data.enText: to spend time in places or conditions that are much worse than those you are used to

data.chText: 在旅行中，有许多办法既可以减少开销又不至于显得寒酸。
data.enText: There are plenty of ways you can cut costs on your trip without slumming.

data.chText: 将就着过简朴生活；过穷日子
data.enText: to accept conditions that are worse than those you are used to

data.chText: 几个商人只好将就着坐在经济舱里。
data.enText: Several businessmen had to slum it in economy class.

word_means: 去贫穷地方，过简朴生活

means: (短期)去贫穷地方，过简朴生活

data.chText: 将就着过简朴生活；过穷日子
data.enText: to accept conditions that are worse than those you are used to

data.chText: 几个商人只好将就着坐在经济舱里。
data.enText: Several businessmen had to slum it in economy class.

tr: a district of a city marked by poverty and inferior living conditions
spend time at a lower socio-economic level than one's own, motivated by curiosity or desire for adventure
example: attending a motion picture show by the upper class was considered sluming in the early 20th century

value.def: A slum is an area of a city where living conditions are very bad and where the houses are in bad condition.

example.ex: ...inner-city slums in the old cities of the north and east.
example.tran: 北部和东部老城市里的市中心贫民区

value.def: If someone is slumming it or is slumming, they are spending time in a place or in conditions that are at a much lower social level than they are used to.

example.tran: 体验下层社会生活的有钱人的孩子

example.ex: ...aristocratic types who enjoyed slumming around in musty old Scottish castles.
example.tran: 喜欢在发霉的苏格兰古堡里体验苦日子的贵族阶层

value.tran: 逛贫民窟;体验下层社会的生活
